typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Emp_No } as string,
		{Emp Name } as string,
		{Department } as string,
		City as string,
		LastUpdated_Date as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> empinblbstrg
empinblbstrg exists(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Exists1
